QUESTION_1_KEY: Can I try before signing up?
ANSWER_1_KEY: As a free user, you have access to all our tools with 25 credits, and once you run out of credits, you'll be limited. By upgrading to a Paid Account, you'll have access to more credits.
QUESTION_2_KEY: I want to purchase the yearly package. Will I get a discount?
ANSWER_2_KEY: CreatorHub already offers very affordable pricing. Currently, we only provide a 20% discount for annual membership compared to the monthly price.
QUESTION_3_KEY: Can I cancel my paid subscription?
ANSWER_3_KEY: Yes, you can pay with one credit card for multiple accounts. Just provide the email addresses of the members in your group, and your paid package will be automatically upgraded.
QUESTION_4_KEY: Can I cancel my paid subscription?
ANSWER_4_KEY: Absolutely! If our service doesn't meet your needs, you can cancel your subscription at any time.
QUESTION_5_KEY: What if I want to change my paid package in the middle?
ANSWER_5_KEY: You can purchase and cancel a paid package as needed from your Account. Similarly, you can upgrade your paid package, and we'll automatically adjust the fee accordingly.
QUESTION_6_KEY: Will I own the images I make?
ANSWER_6_KEY: Yes, you own all the content you generate using the platform and can use it for commercial purposes. This includes any images or assets that are generated based on the input prompts you provide.

feature1Description: Say goodbye to manual writing that doesn't attract readers. Our AI engine easily generates engaging content and relevant hashtags customized to suit your goals. Our website is the essential solution for content creators, marketers, and e-commerce stores.
feature2Description: 1000+ template are carefully crafted to suit any industry or style. With our vibrant and sleek options, you can easily create eye-catching visual that is sure to captivate your audience.
feature3Description: Connect and schedule with ease. Effortlessly link your social media accounts and set the perfect posting times for maximum impact. Creatorhub is a Central Hub for Managing All Your Social Media Platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok, Shopify and so on.
feature4Title: Effortless Branding Management for Your Social Media
feature4Description: Maintain a consistent image across your posts. Simply upload your logo and let Creatorhub seamlessly brand your content, adapting to the occasion with dark or light logo.
postIdeaDescription: Begin by sharing your creative concepts and ideas. Creatorhub gives you the canvas to express your vision for your social media content.
aiPostsDescription: Our powerful AI takes your ideas and transforms them into stunning, ready-to-share social media posts. No more hours spent on content creation; let the AI do the heavy lifting.
connectScheduleDescription: Seamlessly connect your social media accounts and schedule your posts for the perfect timing. Watch your content reach your audience at the right moment, effortlessly.
